item.description:
Due to the limited hours of this little joint during dinner time, we decided on a lunch event.

Criollisimo was named the best place for Puerto Rican food in Connecticut back in 2005 by the Advocate.

From their website (www.criollisimorestaurant.com) it looks like a quaint Mom 'n Pop type place, which ethnic diners know usually means the best food! And their photos of dishes look amazing!

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Puerto Rico--Lunch at Criollisimo in New Britain
